conversion_verification.notes: Successful 3D isometric cutaway transformation with clear wall extrusion.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D geometry and perspective. Wall thickness and floor planes are well-defined.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Most rooms align perfectly. Master Bedroom tray ceiling is represented. Bedroom #2/Bedroom #3 naming and labeling is slightly confused compared to the original, but the physical spaces exist.

interior_elements.notes: Major fixtures (kitchen island, bathroom sinks, car in garage) are present and correctly scaled.

visual_clarity.notes: Lighting is good. Significant points deducted for UI/Text contamination (hallucinated floor text/labels).

detected_errors.description: Text labels from the 2D plan are rendered as distorted artifacts on the 3D floor plane.
Internal labels for Bedroom #2 and #4 are duplicated/mismatched compared to the original plan.

summary: A high-fidelity 3D transformation that preserves the complex architectural footprint, though marred by floor-level text artifacts.
